si.title: එල්ලෙවැල්ල විසින් ව්යාපාරිකයෙකු වෙඩි තබා dead ාතනය කිරීම

en.title: A businessman shot dead by Hangwella

summary_lines: Businessman killed in Hangwella incident summary: Local entrepreneur fatally shot in business dispute resolution gone wrong. Police investigation ongoing. Community shocked by violent outcome to commercial conflict.
